product_name: The North Face RDT Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face RDT Rain jacket offers lightweight, waterproof protection that breathes and stays comfortable even when you're moving fast and building up heat. Highly breathable ripstop 2.5-layer HyVent(R) fabric has a waterproof barrier and a microporous inner print that channels moisture away from your skin. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out, and eliminates the clammy feeling next to skin. Pit zipper vents instantly release excess heat to cool you down. The North Face RDT Rain jacket is highly compressible and can be stuffed into its own hand pocket and carried in your pack. Water-resistant front zipper with internal windflap; 2 zip hand pockets; drawcord hood and hem; adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs.
short_description: The North Face RDT Rain jacket offers lightweight, waterproof protection that breathes and stays comfortable even when you're moving fast and building up heat.
